description: Details of facade/roof surface lighting pursuant to condition 11 of planning permission 233913FUL dated 12.09.2024 for 'Single storey rear extension; installation of canopy structure; and all associated works'
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted information pursuant to condition 11 of planning permission
233913FUL dated 12 September 2024 is deemed to be unsatisfactory and does not meet
the requirements of the condition. Council Officers have attempted to receive
further information and clarifications, however, no  response has been received within a reasonable timeframe. The
proposal would therefore fail to adhere to the objective of providing details of facade/roof surface lighting in accordance with policies D3,
D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7A and 7.4 of the Ealing
Development Management Development Plan Document (2013) and the National
